metadata.title: CVE-2019-17341 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.11.x allowing x86 PV guest OSusers to cause a denial of service or gain privileges by leveraging apage-writability race condition during addition of a passed-through PCIdevice.

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
